Question: Which professor works in low-temperature geochemistry and also overlap with  archeologists and anthropologists??

title: quadej's biography
quadej's articles
sentences: My research is quite broad but key central themes are low-temperature geochemistry, radiometric dating, and paleoenvironmental reconstruction, focused largely (but not entirely) the Cenozoic.
My students and I have been lucky enough to work all over the world on these topics, including the western USA, central Asia, Ethiopia, southern South America, and Turkey.
On a few recent projects I also overlap with archeologists and anthropologists.
